author: TRexroat
post_text: November 20, 2016 at 5:50 AM#1Hey guys,So I've figured out how to toggle, on, and off the special masters (I've set my special master 2.2 + 2.3 to be Program and Exec times). Wondering how I can set the time for each master within a macro?Thanks,T-Rex

posts.post_text: November 20, 2016 at 11:19 AM#2e.g. setting both to 5 seconds:CodeSpecialMaster 2.2 + 2.3 At 5
